summary: Comprehensive testing of Ghost Protocol anonymous real-time chat application completed. Backend functionality is 100% operational with all core features working flawlessly. Frontend integration tests show excellent performance with minor UI interaction issues in WebRTC controls visibility.

design_issues.issue: WebRTC audio controls (start call, mute/unmute, end call) are only visible when users are matched and in chat state, making them difficult to test in isolation
User ID text extraction includes surrounding layout text, should be isolated with proper data-testid

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (health, online users, info)
Online users broadcast and count updates
Frontend loading and Ghost Protocol theme
